logoPrompt: A modern, professional logo featuring a handymanâ€™s toolkit with a hammer and wrench, incorporating a blue color scheme. The design should include the business name 'JC Handyman Specialist' in a bold, clear font, symbolizing reliability and expertise.

hero.headline: Your Local Handyman in Bedfordshire with a Twist
hero.subheadline: Experienced Tradesmen for All Your Home Repair Needs

about.title: About JC Handyman Specialist
about.description: At JC Handyman Specialist, we pride ourselves on delivering top-notch repairs and handyman services across Bedfordshire. With years of experience under our belts, we believe in fixing rather than replacing, saving you both time and money. Whether it's a dropped tile, a TV mount, or more complex repairs, we're here to provide reliable services with a personal touch.
about.imagePrompt: A handyman skillfully repairing a UPVC window, capturing the attention and satisfaction of a homeowner in a cozy, well-lit room. The scene should convey professionalism and reliability.

services.title: Our Expert Services
services.description: From specialized home repairs to everyday handyman tasks, JC Handyman Specialist is equipped to handle it all. Our experienced tradesmen provide quality and tailored solutions to meet your needs.

items.title: UPVC Windows & Doors
items.description: Expert repair and maintenance to keep your windows and doors looking and functioning like new.

items.title: Bath & Shower Trays
items.description: Prevent replacements with our precise repair services for baths and shower trays.

items.title: Front Door Respraying
items.description: Revitalize your entrance with our specialized door respraying services.

items.title: Stone Cills Repair
items.description: Professional assessment and repair of stone cills to maintain structural integrity.

items.title: End-of-Tenancy Repairs
items.description: Handling all necessary repairs to ensure you meet your rental agreement terms.

items.title: TV Bracket Installation
items.description: Keep your TV mounted safely and securely with our expert installations.

items.title: Gutter & Window Cleaning
items.description: Ensure spotless and well-maintained exteriors with our cleaning services.

items.title: Reliable and Trustworthy
items.description: Our team is dependable, ensuring every job is completed to the highest standards.

items.title: Timely Services
items.description: We value your time and guarantee punctual and efficient service.

items.title: Quality Guaranteed
items.description: We pride ourselves on delivering top-quality results, every time.

items.title: Personalized Approach
items.description: We tailor our services to fit your specific needs and preferences.

gallery.title: Our Work Gallery
gallery.subtitle: See Our Specialist Repairs in Action

images.title: UPVC Window Repair
images.description: High-quality UPVC window repair in action.
images.imagePrompt: A close-up photo of a handyman expertly repairing a UPVC window. The image should show precision and attention to detail, emphasizing the craftsman's skill.

images.title: Shower Tray Restoration
images.description: Restoring a shower tray to its former glory.
images.imagePrompt: A craftsman delicately repairing a shower tray surface, highlighting the attention to detail and care in restoration.

images.title: Front Door Renewal
images.description: Transforming a front door with professional respraying.
images.imagePrompt: An action shot of a handyman respraying a front door, featuring vibrant color application and a professional finish.

images.title: Stone Cills Repair
images.description: Restoring stone cills for structural and aesthetic brilliance.
images.imagePrompt: Detail photograph of a stone cill being expertly repaired, showcasing the blending and care put into the restoration process.

images.title: Spotlessly Clean Windows
images.description: Professional cleaning of gutters and windows.
images.imagePrompt: Clean and gleaming windows post-servicing, with an emphasis on the sparkle and clarity achieved through professional cleaning services.

quotes.name: Alice M.
quotes.quote: Fantastic service! My shower tray looks as good as new, and the team was professional and friendly.

quotes.name: John D.
quotes.quote: JC Handyman Specialist saved me from a costly door replacement. Highly recommend their respraying services.

items.question: Do you offer a free quote?
items.answer: Yes, we provide free estimates to help you plan your repair needs.

items.question: Are you insured?
items.answer: Absolutely, we are fully insured to ensure peace of mind for all our clients.

items.question: What areas do you cover?
items.answer: We primarily serve Bedfordshire and surrounding areas.

items.question: Can you do custom jobs?
items.answer: Yes, we're happy to discuss custom projects to meet your specific needs.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: For inquiries, free quotes, or to book a service, feel free to contact us.
